member.name: ID2D1CommandSink3.DrawSpriteBatch
member.summary: Renders part or all of the given sprite batch to the device context using the specified drawing options.
member.param: The index of the first sprite in the sprite batch to draw.
The number of sprites to draw.
The bitmap from which the sprites are to be sourced. Each sprite’s source rectangle refers to a portion of this bitmap.
The interpolation mode to use when drawing this sprite batch. This determines how Direct2D interpolates pixels within the drawn sprites if scaling is performed.
The additional drawing options, if any, to be used for this sprite batch.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: ID2D1CommandSink3
member.summary: This interface performs all the same functions as the existing interface. It also enables access to sprite batch rendering.
